name: Rags to Riches (itch) (Gothsydian Development)
description:
You find yourself without a job, living on the street. Every day is a struggle. You eat from the trashcans, you beg for a jew bucks and you sleep on a bench in a park.

Let's see is you can change that. Get a job, maybe even a degree, and work your way up from there!

The game costs $1. All revenue will go towards developing my big game, Urban Gardener Simulator! More info on my Website.
